name: build-rapier
description: Build scripts targeting a buildless modern browser env.

scripts.build-rust: npm run build-rust-2d && npm run build-rust-3d
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-rust && npm run webpack
scripts.webpack: npx webpack --env phase=src && npx webpack --env phase=compile
scripts.webpack-inline: npx webpack --env phase=src && npx webpack --env phase=compileInlined
